page.title: 15 The Nuthall Hog Fayre
page.content: The Hog Fayre is held in a field off back lane, every year. A pig is roasted on a spit and slices of meat are sold. There are stalls and raffles and games like skittles. There's a game where you try to get a hoop over a bottle which has money inside. If you win then you get the money. There's a snack bar which is pulled along by a horse. The snack bar sells biscuits, buns, cold drinks and lots of other things. There are also Morris dancers at the Fayre. The ladies dance on wooden boards while a man plays an accordian. The dancers have bells on their ankles and flowers round their hats. They carry Sticks which have ribbons on. An aeroplane flies over the Fayre, and if you guess its height then you win a ride in it.
